qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital and Windsor General Hospital, what are the ages of patients T. Jackson and K. Ramos?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson is 95 years old; according to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital, patient K. Ramos is 82 years old.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital and Windsor General Hospital, what are the diagnosis results of T. Jackson and K. Ramos?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, T. Jackson was diagnosed with Major Depressive Disorder; according to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital, K. Ramos was diagnosed with Acute Osteomyelitis.

qa_multi_document_information_integratio.question: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital and Windsor General Hospital, what are the marital statuses of patients T. Jackson and K. Ramos?
qa_multi_document_information_integratio.answer: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital, patient T. Jackson is widowed; according to the hospitalization records of Windsor General Hospital, patient K. Ramos is also widowed.

qa_multi_document_compare.question: According to the hospitalization records of Greenfield General Hospital and Windsor General Hospital, who was admitted earlier, T. Jackson or K. Ramos?
qa_multi_document_compare.answer: T. Jackson was admitted on July 11, and K. Ramos was admitted on October 26. T. Jackson was admitted earlier.
